Attach a copy of your mobile phone invoice to the expense report to support your claim for reimbursement.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Technical Problems\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Upon experiencing any technical problems concerning email or of any other nature, the travelling Employee should call her/his Project Manager or Resource Manager or report the problem by sending an email to\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFTITHelpDesk@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFTITHelpDesk@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Time Reporting\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"During a Business Trip, the same rules apply as to reporting offsite time. The Employee must fill the PMC time journal regularly.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Regarding workdays and non-workdays, the local calendar applies to an Employee working onsite. Any deviation from the local calendar requires the prior approval of the Account Manager or the authorized persons/groups.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Example:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If the Employee is in the USA on July 4, then that is day off. Please note that in this case the Employee still has to report 8 hours to a non-billable task on the project!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Due to any discrepancies between the onsite and the offsite calendars, the Employee has to report 8 hours of non-billable effort to the project for non-work days spent onsite if those days are otherwise work days offsite. The PM or Resource Manager are responsible for providing an appropriate task in PMC with the approval of the Account Manager or the authorized persons/groups.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When traveling during business hours, the Employee has to report the travel time in PMC for the given project. The PM or Resource Manager is responsible for providing an appropriate task in PMC with the approval of the Account Manager or the authorized persons/groups.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vacation (VAC)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a general rule, it is not allowed to take regular vacation during a Business Trip shorter than three months.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"On a Business Trip longer than 3 months, the Employee can take regular vacation with the prior approval of the Account Manager or the authorized persons/groups.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Illness\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case of illness, the onsite Employee must immediately inform his/her Resource Manager, and visit a physician (if it is possible) and try to obtain a doctor's note stating the nature of the ailment. Reporting sickness (ILL) in PMC is not possible if the Employee is onsite. In this case, the Employee must report time to a special non-billable task in the project. The PM or Resource Manager is responsible for providing an appropriate task in PMC with the approval of the Account Manager or the authorized persons/groups.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Business Trip Related Overtime Vacation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Awarding Business Trip related OVT requires the prior approval of the Account Manager or the authorized persons/groups. OVT has to be requested prior to the trip by issuing an OVT request in vts.epam.com.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Travelling Companions\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any additional costs associated with an Employee's travelling companion cannot be covered by EPAM Systems and are the responsibility of the Employee (i.e.: spouses/children/guests travelling with EPAM employees are responsible for paying their own individual expenses).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
